DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Motivos
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Motivos","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  v.Motive,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.Motive, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where	v.Motive is not null
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or v.CommercialClientId in (@ClientOid)) 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or v.ProjectId in (@ProjectOid))
		group by 
				v.Motive
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year","ClientOid","ProjectOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 Projetos
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Projeto","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.Project,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select  v.Project, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where (1 = 1)
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or v.CommercialClientId in (@ClientOid)) 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or v.ProjectId in (@ProjectOid))
		group by 
				v.Project
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year","ClientOid","ProjectOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Análise de Retrabalho
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Departamento, Cliente & Projeto","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":17,"WidgetRows":19,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.Client,
		v.Department,
		v.Project,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Department)) JobsPerDepartment,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Client)) JobsPerClient,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.CommercialClient as Client,
				v.Department,
				v.Project, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where   (1 = 1)
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or v.CommercialClientId in (@ClientOid)) 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or v.ProjectId in (@ProjectOid))
		group by 
				v.CommercialClient,
				v.Department,
				v.Project
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year","ClientOid","ProjectOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Cliente, Projecto e User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"tag","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":37,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":2,"WidgetColumns":11,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"			with t as
(
    select  d.Client,
            d.Project,
            d.Oid
    from    Deliverable d,
            [WorkflowState] ws, 
            [WorkflowStateType] wst
    where 	ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState] and
            wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType] and
            wst.[Status] = 4 and
            cast(d.AgreedDate as date) <= cast(GetDate() as date) and
            ((d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
            ((d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
            ((d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'))
)
select  distinct
        'Client' as GroupName, 
        'ClientOid' as GroupId, 
        c.NameAndExternalId as Name, 
        c.Oid as Oid
from    CommercialClient c, t
where   c.Oid = t.Client
union all
select  distinct 
        'Project' as GroupName, 
        'ProjectOid' as GroupId, 
        p.NameAndExternalId,
		p.Oid
from    Project p, t
where   p.Oid = t.Project","mapping":{"groupExpr":"GroupName","groupId":"GroupId","displayExpr":"Name","valueExpr":"Oid"}}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 Executores
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Executores","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":16,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Projects","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.Executors,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.Executors, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where   v.Executors is not null
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ClientOid) or v.CommercialClientId in (@ClientOid)) 
				and ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' in (@ProjectOid) or v.ProjectId in (@ProjectOid))
		group by 
				v.Executors
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year","ClientOid","ProjectOid"]}}]
